abstract: Final remnants of north tower of World Trade Center are removed from Hangar 17 at Kennedy International Airport, where they were stored after Sept 11, 2001 attack, and distributed to museums and other institutions.

headline.print_headline: Final 9/11 Remnants Removed From Hangar in Solemn Ceremony
headline.main: Final 9/11 Remnants Removed From Hangar in Solemn Ceremony

snippet: Many gathered in Hangar 17 at Kennedy International Airport on Tuesday for a ceremony that commemorated the departure of the final items it housed from the Sept. 11, 2001, attacks on the World Trade Center....
lead_paragraph: Many gathered in Hangar 17 at Kennedy International Airport on Tuesday for a ceremony that commemorated the departure of the final items it housed from the Sept. 11, 2001, attacks on the World Trade Center.
